title: 运行不了客户端1.6.4卡死
txt_content:
出现如下错误：
2014-06-14 21:20:19 [严重] [ForgeModLoader] The following problems were captured during this phase
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR] java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR]         at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR]         at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR]         at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR]         at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR]         at org.jackhuang.hellominecraftlauncher.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:137)
2014-06-14 21:20:27 [信息] [STDERR] Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: PermGen space、

不知道如何解决。

replies.txt_content:
Qin_yu 发表于 2014-6-14 21:45
适当删除一些MOD就好了
是否和内存有关？
